Posts.Content: When I was diagnosed with breast cancer I had two infected lymph nodes in my armpit.  I was told by the radiation oncologist that they were encapsulated.  Does that mean the nodes caught all the cancer and most likely it had not spread?
Posts.Title: lymph nodes

Posts.Content: On 3/12/2009 rose1325 wrote: I have been given a choice of falsodex or tamoxifen.  Has anyone had either? What are the side effects?  I have been on tamoxifen for two years and the main side effect I have experienced is slight to moderate weight gain (10-15 pounds). Although I have to question whether the weight gain is also due to my age.
Posts.Title: Falsodex [Fulverstant] vs tamoxifen
